title: Largest cities in Ukraine 2016
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Residents in millions in each Month on the y axis.
Month Kyïv (Kiev) has the highest Residents in millions and Mariupol' has the lowest Residents in millions.
The difference of Residents in millions between the highest and lowest Month is 2.46.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Residents in millions in the y axis.
The maximum Residents in millions 2.91 is found at Month Kyïv (Kiev) and the minimum is found at Mariupol' where Month is 0.45.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Residents in millions in each Month on the y axis.
Month Kyïv (Kiev) has the highest Residents in millions and Mariupol' has the lowest Residents in millions.
The difference of Residents in millions between the highest and lowest Month is 2.46.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Residents in millions in the y axis.
The Residents in millions is appeared to be the highest at Month Kyïv (Kiev) and lowest at Month Mariupol'.
The difference of Residents in millions between the highest and lowest Month is 2.46.
Residents in millions at Month Kyïv (Kiev) is 2.91 , second place is Charkiv at 1.45, and thirdly is Odėsa at 1.01.
Overall Residents in millions has declined over the Months.
The Month Kyïv (Kiev) tends to be 2.81 percent higher than average.
The Residents in millions is 10.35 if we add up values of all Months.
